与心脏病风险较高相关的社区的步行性低根据欧洲心脏病学学会（ESC）的科学大会，邻里的可步行性低与心血管疾病（CVD）的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/low-walkability-in-in-neighborhoods-massived-wither-wither-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/low-walkability-in--in-neighborhoods-shighborhoods-apersived-wither-wither-heart-disease-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5B942D93-5675-47E0-98CD-103FA319EC19 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 08:23:59 -0400 Low walkability in neighborhoods associated with higher heart disease risk
与更快的认知下降有关的心力衰竭一项研究表明，有超过600万的患有心力衰竭的美国人有更大的风险失去生活早期的认知能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/heart-failure-linked-to-faster-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/heart-failure-linked-to-faster-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88142fee-b9c6-453f-a46f-6676389aacac Thu, 03 Apr 2025 08:14:24 -0400 Heart failure linked to faster cognitive decline

NUZ-001在人类3D脑模型中显示阳性结果Neurizon Therapeutics Limited (“Neurizon”), a clinical-stage biotech company dedicated to advancing treatments for neurodegenerative diseases, is pleased to advise that results from an independent study undertaken in collaboration with Tessara Therapeutics (“Tessara”) will be presented by the group's Principal Scientist and Alzheimer's Disease expert, Dr Mark Greenough at the AD/PD 2025 Advances in 4月2日至3日的科学与治疗会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/nuz-001-shows-posisity-results-in-human-3d-brain-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/nuz-001-shows-posisity-results-in-human-3d-brain-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dee8acf6-25A-492F-9B7B-CD54A6CCDCE2 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 07:39:00 -0400 NUZ-001 shows positive results in human 3D brain model
在领先的全球医学会议上，介绍了有关使用Ensozip™来治疗肥胖患者的新数据旨在治疗肥胖症的全自动内窥镜缝合系统Endozip™的开发商Nitinotes今天宣布，对Entozip™系统的临床研究将在即将举行的领先的国际医疗会议上介绍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/New-data-on-use-of-EndoZipe284a2-to-treat-obese-patients-be-presented-at-leading-global-medical-conferences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/New-data-on-use-of-EndoZipe284a2-to-treat-obese-patients-be-presented-at-leading-global-medical-conferences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9E0E7203-7885-4A69-BC89-0BD734F45EDEDEDEDEDE Thu, 03 Apr 2025 07:31:00 -0400 New data on use of EndoZip™ to treat obese patients be presented at leading global medical conferences
4BASEBIO获得MHRA GMP的制造和供应合成DNA的许可证4Basebio PLC（AIM：4BB）（“ 4BASEBIO”），该公司开发和商业化了合成DNA的大规模制造以及纳米粒子递送解决方案，今天宣布已从英国的药物和医疗保健产品调节机构（MHRA）获得了良好的制造实践（GMP）认证（GMP）认证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/4basebio-receives-mhra-gmp-licence-for-fipor-manufacture-manufacture-andufacture-and-supplly-supply-supplly of pynthetic-dna.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/4basebio-receives-mhra-gmp-licence-for-for-for-manufacture-manufacture-andufacture-and-supply of phynthetic-dna.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B916906D-655D-48A9-BE01-BE01-A577CA3F9A79 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 07:04:00 -0400 4basebio receives MHRA GMP licence for manufacture and supply of synthetic DNA

失去了什么：特朗普打击了努力使国家医疗保健更安全的微小机构苏·谢里丹（Sue Sheridan）的男婴卡尔（Cal）在1995年因未发现的黄疸而遭受了脑部损害。海伦·哈斯克尔（Helen Haskell）的15岁儿子刘易斯（Lewis）在2000年手术后去世，因为周末医院工作人员没有意识到自己感到震惊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/whate28099s-lost-trump-whacks-tiny-agency-tiny-agency-works-works-to-make-to-make-natione28099s-health-health-pare-care-care-safer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/whate28099s-lost-trump-whacks-tiny-agency-tiny-agency-that-works-works-to-make-the-natione28099s-health-health-pare-health-care-care-care-safer-safer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7B326442-5D3C-41F5-94A8-5F7199C4E916 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 06:51:30 -0400 What’s lost: Trump whacks tiny agency that works to make the nation’s health care safer
